text: Marco Aurelio Denegri Santagadea (16 May 1938 - 27 July 2018) was a Peruvian intellectual, literature critic and sexologist. He made many important works to the linguistics of Spanish. During the 1970s, Denegri was the director of the magazine Revista Científica y Artística de Cultural Sexual - Fáscinum. Its first issue was published in April 1972. From 1997 to 2000 he hosted the TV show A solas con Marco Aurelio Denegri on cable channel Cable Mágico Cultural. ==References== ==Other websites== * Marco Aurelio Denegri | La función de la palabra Category:1938 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Peruvian journalists Category:Television presenters Category:Literary critics Category:Peruvian academics Category:Writers from Lima Category:Sexologists
